Portfolio

ChiSalary

ChiSalary gives users access to Chicago’s rich database of city employee salaries. You can easily search from thousands of provided salaries.

Arduino Home Security System

The Arduino Home Security System is both smart and portable. It’s a lightweight security system that you can easily place on any door in your house. The Arduino Home Security System also uses crowd sourcing by notifiying you via text message if your neighbors houses have been broken into.
